title: virasog
author: virasog
content: Once again, Trading halted at binance but this time at the SPOT.With such a big exchange and infrastructure this should not happen in the first place. People can't close their trades neither they can make new spot trades. In case Bitcoin Fluctuates too much, it will have an impact on Binance users as in case of a dump they will be holding the coins in loss, the stop losses might not trigger

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Binance suddenly haults all crypto trading services on spot!Quote from: virasog on March 24, 2023, 12:54:44 PMOnce again, Trading halted at binance but this time at the SPOT.Deposit and withdrawal are also suspended.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: I keep getting the feeling Binance is being operated with more in their marketing and management budget then in their infrastructure and hardware budget.Too many instances of things going wrong on a regular bases. Not show stopping implosion things, but now we patch this to make it work and then we patch the next thing and so on. Not actaully stopping to do it properly.I don't use them on any kind of regular basis, but it seems that they have more things happen to them then other places.Could also be that more people talk about it since they are the largest.-Dave

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on March 24, 2023, 01:16:21 PMBinance suddenly haults all crypto trading services on spot!Quote from: virasog on March 24, 2023, 12:54:44 PMOnce again, Trading halted at binance but this time at the SPOT.Deposit and withdrawal are also suspended.First Trading was resumed and finally, withdrawals are also resumed. People will just forget today's (and previous incidents) and keep on trading/depositing at binance until one day when the withdrawal will be halted but will never resume. Believe me, someday this situation will come, so I never trust a centralized exchange no matter how SAFU they claim themselves.
